transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning, Ranjit baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se Ranjit baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Theek hai sir badhiya hai.
Executive: Aur sir ye apni company chaliye smart balls ke liye call kiya hun and sir last time aapke discussion hui thi mere manager se aur aap kya kya change hua tha sir jo aapka update category abhi marble temples and marble jaali hai sir right to abhi sir main ye call feedback ke liye kiya hun ki abhi sir kaisa response hum log generate kar pa rahe hain IndiaMART abhi kuch improvement aapko kuch nahi hai sir bakwas hai sara ka sara sab bakwas hai sir ye cheez bakwas hai.
Executive: Abhi sir abhi bhi same issue face kar rahe hain ya abhi kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Kya dikkat aa rahi hai mere ko ek saal ho gaya maine payment galat kar di mera koi kaam nahi nikal raha kya karu main aap se baat karta hu mere ko.
Executive: Sir bilkul main samajh raha hun aapka yahan pe jo leads sold out issue tha ye bhi issue tha jis karan se nahi ho pa raha tha but sir isme na jab bhi hamara discussion hua tha ha sir isme aapki galti nahi hai aapki company ki galti nahi hai hamari galti hai iske andar.
Executive: Ji sir baat aapke manager ki bhi galti nahi hai unhone bhi convince kar diya mere ko main convince ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi sir baat convince karne ki nahi hai aap IndiaMART pe kahin na kahin invest kiye hain aap business ke liye hi kiya hai so hamara bhi invest nahi kiya maine aap logo ko convince ke upar invest kiya maine payment apna wo investment kiya uska mere ko uska result nahi mila uska kuch cheez ke andar.
Customer: Jitna mujhe main 10 saal se juda hua hun 10 saal se mujhe jitna mere ko milna chahiye itna matlab aap logo ko convince karte karte main 3300 se 75 pe aaya 75 se 1 lakh pe aaya 1 lakh se fir main ek package ke matlab 7000 pe aaya 7000 ke baad me fir main ek saal ke 191000 package pe aaya.
Customer: Lekin jo mere sath bura hua na wo mere ko bahut feel karta hai us cheez ke andar aur ye cheez main aapko dekh raha hun lekin uska solution nahi hai aap logo ka jawab yahi hai ki bhai hum kya kar sakte hain uske andar.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi baat nahi hai isme thoda sa aapka issue isliye rehta hai because yahan pe highly competitive categories vajah is karan se otherwise sir dekhe to aap kafi samay se hain already to aisi baat nahi ki aapko previously koi business nahi mila hoga aur aap hamare sath service upgrade karte chale gaye kuch na kuch to sir hamare portal se mila hoga but abhi aapka experience kharab hai abhi aapko kya mujhe 2000 4000 ye mil rahe hain ye koi badi baat hai kya ye milna nahi abhi subah se leke subah se leke main agar sham tak baithta hun to kya matlab hai mere baithne ka main agar palak karte ke sath mere sath lead meri wo koi aur consume kar leta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. sir dekhiye wo bhi samajh raha hun abhi na sir main check kar raha tha jo aapka marble temples and marble jaali category aapne last time change karwaya hua tha to abhi fir se aapne uses karna isko band kahi kar diya hai kyuki aap jo bhi kya karu to main jo main keh raha hun na mera dimag hi kharab ho gaya pura pura chutiyo ki tarah sab din baithe raho system ke upar kuch na mile kya karna uska.
Executive: Sir abhi main dekh raha hun jo last 12 month mein last 12 mahine ki aapka jo result hai usme pehle aapne February mein service activate hui do mahine aapne use kiya uske baad band kar diya tha fir wo aapke kehne pe ki maine ha bilkul wahi main keh raha hun sir aapke kehne pe maine ki usme result kya mila mere ko 2000 3000 4000 ye koi wo hai kya koi cheez ye.
Customer: Nahi bilkul main samajh raha hun sir aapne fir se use karna start kiya tha beech mein aapne July mahine mein acche se use kiya tha uske baad August mein bhi thoda bahut use hua tha and September mein aap kahin bahar chale gaye the October mein aapne kafi acha use kiya hua tha to sir is do mahine mein jo aapne July mein kiya October mein kiya isme matlab ab mere kehne se ya jo bhi aapko mera bata raha hun mere ko sir ye problem aa rahi hai isko koi samadhan nahi ho raha aapke paas mein to main kya karna fir uske andar kam karke.
Executive: Sir abhi aap meri aap problem ka mera jab aap meri problem ka solution nahi kar pa rahe ho to main kya karunga usko fir mere ko batao mera time aur isme kharab karunga main koi aur kaam karu do rupay kamaunga main baithe baithe.
Executive: Nahi bilkul main samajh gaya sir but jo hamara process hai jo yahan se aapko leads mil sakti hai uska sir ek hi option hai ki aap isko thoda sa actively reh ke consume karenge tabhi ho payega kyuki aapne pehle kiya bhi hai kafi sari leads aapke paas se chali gayi sold out ho gaya usko aap nahi kar paye but kafi sari leads aapne purchase bhi kar paye sir jo aapne meri galti sir main keh raha hun na meri galti hai main purchase nahi kar paya aap mere ko lakhon rupay ka business dete aap mere ko lakhon rupay ka business dete main consume nahi kar paya aap dete hue bhi aap mere ko.
Executive: Nahi sir baat aapki galti nahi hai matlab kuch main ye keh raha hun ki aapne kafi leads consume kar paye sir us pe to kuch na kuch hum log acha response generate kar paye honge sir to us tarike se hi isko karna padega kyuki ye competitive categories hai yahan pe leads aati hai jo log eligible hote hain unke unko mil jata hai jo nahi hote to unko nahi mil pata hai sir to us tarike se hi karke thoda sa karna padega tabhi ho payega sir otherwise dusra koi another option thoda busy hun main na.
Executive: Abhi aap leads consume kar sakte hain. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting any business.

- Feels cheated by IndiaMART's services.

- Expresses frustration with the lack of solutions.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the competitive nature of categories.

- Suggested actively consuming leads to improve results.

- Executive put the call on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer experience, resolution
